repo.name: ineluctable-overlay
repo.description: Ineluctable Overlay offers a repository of Gentoo ebuilds made by me (Mauro Toffanin, official Gentoo/FreeBSD Arch Tester) for projects that I am interested in and are not yet into Portage.
